entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
